rules_text:
Flash
When this enchantment enters, exile target spell you don't control.
You may cast the exiled card on your turn, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
flavor_text:
[i]“There is an art that allows one to summon the power of a primal. It is all I have left, so I give it to you.”
—Louisoix Leveilleur, last words[/i]
